name: Revolution (itch) (IBricchi, VSietses)
description:
Description:

My Lord, the foolish peasants believe they can do a better job at ruling than you, and they're coming for your head. Deploy your loyal servants in your towers and power them up with your royal beam to protect yourself. 

However, be warned, your subjects need your royal inspiration. They will not fire without your presence being felt. Rotating your beam will also hasten their reloads signficantly.

THE REVOLUTION CANNOT BE ALLOWED TO SUCCEED.

Controls:

Select a tower from your menu and then place it down on the map to buy it.

To power the tower rotate your beam of magic to cover the tower. It will then begin attacking the serfs coming for your castle. It will also speed up the tower's reload by a factor of 3.

Every disloyal villein you kill and every round you survive gives you more money to be able to buy more and better towers.

Towers:

House:

  • Cost: 30
  • Attack power 1
  • 3s reload

Shop:

  • Cost: 100
  • Attack power 1
  • Long Range
  • Attack moves through multiple players at once
  • Long reload

Forge:

  • Cost: 150
  • Attack power 2
  • Short Range
  • Fast reload

Comments

This game was made for the Kenney Game Jam 2021, with the theme rotation. The game fits this theme using the rotating beam of magic, as well as the fact that rotation is a synonym of revolution, which is what our game is about (I know we really stretched that second one).

Assets and particles come from kenney.nl

The music loop is from bensound.com

Sound effects from rpg.hamsterrepublic.com

Peasant death noises self-recorded

Fonts from fonts.google.com

The game was made using the Godot Engine godotengine.org

Source code for the game can be found at github.com/IBricchi/Revolution

Thanks for playing the game, please let us know what you thought!
